data.text: @pattykad @VanityFair Yes! And I guarantee that there will be 7 or 8 of you in the audience..
@rhurhurhur @pattykad @VanityFair @SJP @CynthiaNixon @KristinDavis Lol you can not replace Willie 😉😂
@Ray717Alexis @pattykad @VanityFair @SJP @CynthiaNixon @KristinDavis No? Warwick would be the perfect fit. You know it makes sense..

@VanityFair Samantha has died from cancer.  Smith is comforted by Charlotte and as sometimes happen, they comfort each other too much.   Miranda's kid has turned into a juvenile delinquent.  And Big is still perfect.
@Ray717Alexis @pattykad @VanityFair @SJP @CynthiaNixon @KristinDavis Yes! And Stanford Blatch aka #williegarson to be played by Warwick Davis..?
@pattykad @VanityFair @SJP @CynthiaNixon @KristinDavis A fitting end for that character. It makes perfect sense. And will hook the viewers from the get go
@Ray717Alexis @VanityFair @SJP @CynthiaNixon @KristinDavis Exactly.  We all deal with losing people in life.    It would be very touching.

@VanityFair They dont need Samantha. Open the movie with Samantha's funeral (cancer returned), and then have her 'long lost sister introduced at the funeral. Someone with similar mannerisms that endears her to the girls. And the story continues...@SJP @CynthiaNixon @KristinDavis ❤❤❤
